name: Air3020
description:
Story

In 3020 the drones are king but it seems that an old-fashioned plane must destroy the warplane controlled by the drones to restore peace to the world!

Use the keyboard

Arrow Keys: move / SPACE: shot / X: special attack

Use GamePad

Directional Left Stick: move / A: shop / B: special attack
